item.title: If Else In Sed
item.description: If-else statement in linux command sed use t or T to control the sed workflow.(more) 1 2 sed -i "s/animations = true/animations = false/;t;\ s/animations = false/animations = true/" "$picom_config" Reference How to toggle a comment in a line using sed Sed/Branching-and-flow-control
